mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wx_message( from_user, to_user, create_time, msg_type, content, pic_url, media_id, format_, thumbMedia_id, location_x, location_y, scale, label, title, description, url, msg_id, local_file ) VALUES( #{FromUserName}, #{ToUserName}, #{CreateTime}, #{MsgType}, #{Content}, #{PicUrl}, #{MediaId}, #{Format}, #{ThumbMediaId}, #{Location_X}, #{Location_Y}, #{Scale}, #{Label}, #{Title}, #{Description}, #{Url}, #{MsgId}, #{localFile} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM wx_message WHERE to_user = #{sourceId} AND from_user = #{openId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wx_message WHERE to_user = #{toUser} and from_user = #{fromUser}
mapper.select: SELECT m.content 'Content', m.create_time 'CreateTime', m.msg_type 'MsgType', m.media_id 'MediaId', m.pic_url 'PicUrl', m.thumbMedia_id 'ThumbMediaId', m.local_file 'localFile', d.nickname 'wxUserDetail.nickname', d.headimgurl 'wxUserDetail.headimgurl', d.openid 'wxUserDetail.openid' FROM wx_message m, wx_user_openid o, wx_user_detail d WHERE o.public_id = #{0} AND o.openid = m.from_user AND m.from_user = d.openid ORDER BY m.create_time DESC
